About Me

BIO

I've always been as affectionate by science and technology. Before I get to the university in 2004, I was able to develope an application on "Clipper 5", An old programming language.
After graduating in Systems Information on july 2008, I kept working at the same company, where I assumed many crucial responsibility, like: Billing, Cost Control, Data Analyses, contracts and mush more.
These last years, I have been working as a consultant for many different company.
In 2020 I reminded me how I love to code, so I decided to learn Python as a new programming language.
Now, I keep working hard like a ever did and learning more day by day.
